body_html: It is defined in the corresponding header, with this THP_API prefix. Still, I'm not exactly sure how extern works in Windows, because there's either sth wrong with this code, or it is utterly useless, as you can't even declare things extern and have them visible in other compilation units
body_text: It is defined in the corresponding header, with this THP_API prefix. Still, I'm not exactly sure how extern works in Windows, because there's either sth wrong with this code, or it is utterly useless, as you can't even declare things extern and have them visible in other compilation units
body: It is defined in the corresponding header, with this `THP_API` prefix. Still, I'm not exactly sure how `extern` works in Windows, because there's either sth wrong with this code, or it is utterly useless, as you can't even declare things `extern` and have them visible in other compilation units
